27#ifndef HB_CONFIG_HH
28#define HB_CONFIG_HH
29
30#if 0 /* Make test happy. */
31#include "hb.hh"
32#endif
33
34#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
35#include "config.h"
36#endif
37
38#ifndef HB_EXPERIMENTAL_API
39#define HB_NO_BEYOND_64K
40#define HB_NO_CUBIC_GLYF
41#define HB_NO_VAR_COMPOSITES
42#endif
43
44#ifdef HB_TINY
45#define HB_LEAN
46#define HB_MINI
47#define HB_NO_MT
48#define HB_NO_UCD_UNASSIGNED
49#ifndef NDEBUG
50#define NDEBUG
51#endif
52#ifndef __OPTIMIZE_SIZE__
53#define __OPTIMIZE_SIZE__
54#endif
55#endif
56
57#ifdef HB_LEAN
58#define HB_DISABLE_DEPRECATED
59#define HB_NDEBUG
60#define HB_NO_ATEXIT
61#define HB_NO_BUFFER_MESSAGE

107/* Closure of options. */

109#ifdef HB_NO_BORING_EXPANSION

112#endif
113

118#endif
